added.description:
Increase the thread stack size to include space for glibc 
static thread-local storage (TLS) if true
added.name: AdjustStackSizeForTLS
ArchiveRelocationMode
CompilationMode

added.description:
Allow JVMCI to be used in product mode. This alters a subset of 
JVMCI flags to be non-experimental, defaults UseJVMCICompiler 
and EnableJVMCI to true and defaults UseJVMCINativeLibrary 
to true if a JVMCI native library is available.
added.name: EnableJVMCIProduct
ShenandoahGCMode

added.description: Static heap region size. Set zero to enable automatic sizing.
added.name: ShenandoahRegionSize

added.description:
Fix references with load reference barrier. Disabling this 
might degrade performance.
added.name: ShenandoahSelfFixing

added.description:
Show exception messages from RuntimeExceptions that contain 
snippets of the failing code. Disable this to improve privacy.
added.name: ShowCodeDetailsInExceptionMessages

added.description:
Back edge threshold at which to switch to interpreter 
to profile if coming from AOT 
(applicable only with 
CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier0AOTBackEdgeThreshold

added.description:
Threshold at which to switch to interpreter to profile 
if coming from AOT 
(invocation minimum must be satisfied, 
applicable only with 
CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier0AOTCompileThreshold

added.description:
Switch to interpreter to profile if the number of method 
invocations crosses this threshold if coming from AOT 
(applicable only with 
CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier0AOTInvocationThreshold

added.description:
Minimum number of invocations to switch to interpreter 
to profile if coming from AOT 
(applicable only with 
CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier0AOTMinInvocationThreshold

added.description:
If C2 queue size grows over this amount per compiler thread 
do not start profiling in the interpreter 
(applicable only with 
CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier0Delay

added.description:
Back edge threshold at which tier 4 OSR compilation is invoked 
(applicable only with 
CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier40BackEdgeThreshold

added.description:
Threshold at which tier 4 compilation is invoked (invocation 
minimum must be satisfied, applicable only with 
CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier40CompileThreshold

added.description:
Compile if number of method invocations crosses this 
threshold (applicable only with 
CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier40InvocationThreshold

added.description:
Minimum number of invocations to compile at tier 4 
(applicable only with 
CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
added.name: Tier40MinInvocationThreshold

removed.description: (Deprecated) Allow JNIEnv proxies for jdbx
removed.name: AllowJNIEnvProxy

removed.description: Bind CMS Thread to CPU if possible
removed.name: BindCMSThreadToCPU

removed.description: Bind GCTaskThreads to CPUs if possible
removed.name: BindGCTaskThreadsToCPUs

removed.description:
Maintain _unallocated_block in BlockOffsetArray 
(currently applicable only to CMS collector)
removed.name: BlockOffsetArrayUseUnallocatedBlock

removed.description: Whether abort-on-overflow semantics is implemented
removed.name: CMSAbortSemantics

removed.description: Nominal minimum work per abortable preclean iteration
removed.name: CMSAbortablePrecleanMinWorkPerIteration

removed.description:
Time that we sleep between iterations when not given 
enough work per iteration
removed.name: CMSAbortablePrecleanWaitMillis

removed.description:
Bitmap operations should process at most this many bits 
between yields
removed.name: CMSBitMapYieldQuantum

removed.description:
Percentage CMS generation occupancy at which to 
initiate CMS collection for bootstrapping collection stats
removed.name: CMSBootstrapOccupancy

removed.description:
Interval in milliseconds that CMS thread checks if it 
should start a collection cycle
removed.name: CMSCheckInterval

removed.description: Whether class unloading enabled when using CMS GC
removed.name: CMSClassUnloadingEnabled

removed.description:
When CMS class unloading is enabled, the maximum CMS cycle 
count for which classes may not be unloaded
removed.name: CMSClassUnloadingMaxInterval

removed.description: Clean-on-enter optimization for reducing number of dirty cards
removed.name: CMSCleanOnEnter

removed.description: Size (in cards) of CMS concurrent MT marking task
removed.name: CMSConcMarkMultiple

removed.description:
Whether multi-threaded concurrent work enabled 
(effective only if ParNewGC)
removed.name: CMSConcurrentMTEnabled

removed.description:
Number of times the coordinator GC thread will sleep while 
yielding before giving up and resuming GC
removed.name: CMSCoordinatorYieldSleepCount

removed.description:
Always record eden chunks used for the parallel initial mark 
or remark of eden
removed.name: CMSEdenChunksRecordAlways

removed.description:
Percentage (0-100) used to weight the current sample when 
computing exponential averages for CMS statistics
removed.name: CMSExpAvgFactor

removed.description: CMS: cushion for block demand during sweep
removed.name: CMSExtrapolateSweep

removed.description:
Percentage (0-100) used to add conservatism when computing the 
duty cycle
removed.name: CMSIncrementalSafetyFactor

removed.description: Replenish an indexed free list with this number of chunks
removed.name: CMSIndexedFreeListReplenish

removed.description:
Percentage CMS generation occupancy to start a CMS collection 
cycle. A negative value means that CMSTriggerRatio is used
removed.name: CMSInitiatingOccupancyFraction

removed.description:
An absolute ceiling above which CMS will always consider the 
unloading of classes when class unloading is enabled
removed.name: CMSIsTooFullPercentage

removed.description:
CMS: the factor by which to inflate estimated demand of large 
block sizes to prevent coalescing with an adjoining block
removed.name: CMSLargeCoalSurplusPercent

removed.description:
CMS: the factor by which to inflate estimated demand of large 
block sizes to prevent splitting to supply demand for smaller 
blocks
removed.name: CMSLargeSplitSurplusPercent

removed.description: Warn in case of excessive CMS looping
removed.name: CMSLoopWarn

removed.description: Simulate frequent marking stack / work queue overflow
removed.name: CMSMarkStackOverflowALot

removed.description:
An 'interval' counter that determines how frequently 
to simulate overflow; a smaller number increases frequency
removed.name: CMSMarkStackOverflowInterval

removed.description: Maximum number of abortable preclean iterations, if > 0
removed.name: CMSMaxAbortablePrecleanLoops

removed.description: Maximum time in abortable preclean (in milliseconds)
removed.name: CMSMaxAbortablePrecleanTime

removed.description:
Maximum size of CMS gen promotion LAB caches per worker 
per block size
removed.name: CMSOldPLABMax

removed.description:
Minimum size of CMS gen promotion LAB caches per worker 
per block size
removed.name: CMSOldPLABMin

removed.description:
Nominal number of refills of CMS gen promotion LAB cache 
per worker per block size
removed.name: CMSOldPLABNumRefills

removed.description:
The gain in the feedback loop for on-the-fly PLAB resizing 
during a scavenge
removed.name: CMSOldPLABReactivityFactor

removed.description:
React on-the-fly during a scavenge to a sudden 
change in block demand rate
removed.name: CMSOldPLABResizeQuicker

removed.description:
The tolerance of the phase-change detector for on-the-fly 
PLAB resizing during a scavenge
removed.name: CMSOldPLABToleranceFactor

removed.description:
Always record survivor space PLAB boundaries (effective only 
if CMSParallelSurvivorRemarkEnabled)
removed.name: CMSPLABRecordAlways

removed.description: Use the parallel initial mark.
removed.name: CMSParallelInitialMarkEnabled

removed.description: Whether parallel remark enabled (only if ParNewGC)
removed.name: CMSParallelRemarkEnabled

removed.description:
Whether parallel remark of survivor space 
enabled (effective only if CMSParallelRemarkEnabled)
removed.name: CMSParallelSurvivorRemarkEnabled

removed.description:
CMSPrecleanNumerator:CMSPrecleanDenominator yields convergence 
ratio
removed.name: CMSPrecleanDenominator

removed.description: Maximum number of precleaning iteration passes
removed.name: CMSPrecleanIter

removed.description:
CMSPrecleanNumerator:CMSPrecleanDenominator yields convergence 
ratio
removed.name: CMSPrecleanNumerator

removed.description: Preclean ref lists during (initial) preclean phase
removed.name: CMSPrecleanRefLists1

removed.description: Preclean ref lists during abortable preclean phase
removed.name: CMSPrecleanRefLists2

removed.description: Preclean survivors during (initial) preclean phase
removed.name: CMSPrecleanSurvivors1

removed.description: Preclean survivors during abortable preclean phase
removed.name: CMSPrecleanSurvivors2

removed.description: Do not iterate again if number of dirty cards is less than this
removed.name: CMSPrecleanThreshold

removed.description: Whether concurrent precleaning enabled
removed.name: CMSPrecleaningEnabled

removed.description:
If logging for the 'gc' and 'promotion' tags is enabled on
trace level include more detailed information about the
free chunks
removed.name: CMSPrintChunksInDump

removed.description:
If logging for the 'gc' and 'promotion' tags is enabled on
trace level include more detailed information about the
allocated objects
removed.name: CMSPrintObjectsInDump

removed.description: Choose variant (1,2) of verification following remark
removed.name: CMSRemarkVerifyVariant

removed.description: Replenish all intermediate free-list caches
removed.name: CMSReplenishIntermediate

removed.description: Size (in cards) of CMS parallel rescan task
removed.name: CMSRescanMultiple

removed.description: The minimum distance between eden samples for CMS (see above)
removed.name: CMSSamplingGrain

removed.description: Attempt scavenge before the CMS remark step
removed.name: CMSScavengeBeforeRemark

removed.description:
The Eden occupancy percentage (0-100) at which 
to try and schedule remark pause
removed.name: CMSScheduleRemarkEdenPenetration

removed.description: If Eden size is below this, do not try to schedule remark
removed.name: CMSScheduleRemarkEdenSizeThreshold

removed.description:
Start sampling eden top at least before young gen 
occupancy reaches 1/<ratio> of the size at which 
we plan to schedule remark
removed.name: CMSScheduleRemarkSamplingRatio

removed.description:
CMS: the factor by which to inflate estimated demand of small 
block sizes to prevent coalescing with an adjoining block
removed.name: CMSSmallCoalSurplusPercent

removed.description:
CMS: the factor by which to inflate estimated demand of small 
block sizes to prevent splitting to supply demand for smaller 
blocks
removed.name: CMSSmallSplitSurplusPercent

removed.description:
When satisfying batched demand, split blocks from the 
IndexedFreeList whose size is a multiple of requested size
removed.name: CMSSplitIndexedFreeListBlocks

removed.description:
Check if the coalesced range is already in the 
free lists as claimed
removed.name: CMSTestInFreeList

removed.description:
Commence a CMS collection cycle (at least) every so many 
milliseconds (0 permanently, -1 disabled)
removed.name: CMSTriggerInterval

removed.description:
Percentage of MinHeapFreeRatio in CMS generation that is 
allocated before a CMS collection cycle commences
removed.name: CMSTriggerRatio

removed.description:
Check that all the garbage collected was returned to the 
free lists
removed.name: CMSVerifyReturnedBytes

removed.description: Time in milliseconds that CMS thread waits for young GC
removed.name: CMSWaitDuration

removed.description: Don't drain below this size per parallel worker/thief
removed.name: CMSWorkQueueDrainThreshold

removed.description: Yield between steps of CMS
removed.name: CMSYield

removed.description:
Number of times a GC thread (minus the coordinator) 
will sleep while yielding before giving up and resuming GC
removed.name: CMSYieldSleepCount

removed.comment: // default max size of CMS young gen, per GC worker thread
removed.name: CMSYoungGenPerWorker

removed.description:
The multiple of deviation from mean to use for buffering 
against volatility in free list demand
removed.name: CMS_FLSPadding

removed.description:
Percentage (0-100) used to weight the current sample when 
computing exponentially decaying averages for CMS FLS 
statistics
removed.name: CMS_FLSWeight

removed.description:
The multiple of deviation from mean to use for buffering 
against volatility in inter-sweep duration
removed.name: CMS_SweepPadding

removed.description:
Skip block flux-rate sampling for an epoch unless inter-sweep 
duration exceeds this threshold in milliseconds
removed.name: CMS_SweepTimerThresholdMillis

removed.description:
Percentage (0-100) used to weight the current sample when 
computing exponentially decaying average for inter-sweep 
duration
removed.name: CMS_SweepWeight

removed.description: When BindCMSThreadToCPU is true, the CPU to bind CMS thread to
removed.name: CPUForCMSThread

removed.description: which compilation policy (0-2)
removed.name: CompilationPolicyChoice

removed.description: CMS: larger free blocks are always available for coalescing
removed.name: FLSAlwaysCoalesceLarge

removed.description:
CMS: aggressiveness level for coalescing, increasing 
from 0 to 4
removed.name: FLSCoalescePolicy

removed.description:
CMS: the smaller the percentage the greater the coalescing 
force
removed.name: FLSLargestBlockCoalesceProximity

removed.description:
Verify that all references across the FLS boundary 
are to valid objects
removed.name: FLSVerifyAllHeapReferences

removed.description: Do lots of (expensive) FLS index table verification
removed.name: FLSVerifyIndexTable

removed.description: Do lots of (expensive) FreeListSpace verification
removed.name: FLSVerifyLists

removed.description: Fail over to old verifier when split verifier fails
removed.name: FailOverToOldVerifier

removed.description: Pre-touch large auxiliary data structures used by the GC.
removed.name: G1PretouchAuxiliaryMemory

removed.description:
The exit of a JNI critical section necessitating a scavenge, 
also kicks off a background concurrent collection
removed.name: GCLockerInvokesConcurrent

removed.description: Number of time stamp entries per gc worker thread
removed.name: GCTaskTimeStampEntries

removed.description: disable locking assertions (for speed)
removed.name: IgnoreLockingAssertions

removed.description:
The maximum number of interpreted frames to skip when searching 
for recompilee
removed.name: MaxInterpretedSearchLength

removed.description:
The maximum number of frames to inspect when searching for 
recompilee
removed.name: MaxRecompilationSearchLength

removed.description:
Percentage (0-100) used to weight the current sample when 
computing exponentially decaying average for resizing 
OldPLABSize
removed.name: OldPLABWeight

removed.description:
The number of cards in each chunk of the parallel chunks used 
during card table scanning
removed.name: ParGCCardsPerStrideChunk

removed.description: The desired number of objects to claim from the overflow list
removed.name: ParGCDesiredObjsFromOverflowList

removed.description:
The number of strides per worker thread that we divide up the 
card table scanning work into
removed.name: ParGCStridesPerThread

removed.description:
Eagerly trim the local overflow lists 
(when ParGCUseLocalOverflow)
removed.name: ParGCTrimOverflow

removed.description: Instead of a global overflow list, use local overflow stacks
removed.name: ParGCUseLocalOverflow

removed.description: Simulate work queue overflow in ParNew
removed.name: ParGCWorkQueueOverflowALot

removed.description:
An `interval' counter that determines how frequently 
we simulate overflow; a smaller number increases frequency
removed.name: ParGCWorkQueueOverflowInterval

removed.description: Used to implement -v:jni
removed.name: PrintJNIResolving

removed.description: Print malloc/free statistics
removed.name: PrintMallocStatistics

removed.description: Dynamically resize (old gen) promotion LAB's
removed.name: ResizeOldPLAB

removed.description:
When allocation tracing is enabled, the allocation stalls 
larger than this threshold would be reported as warnings. 
Time is in microseconds.
removed.name: ShenandoahAllocationStallThreshold

removed.description:
Trace allocation latencies and stalls. Can be expensive when 
lots of allocations happen, and may introduce scalability 
bottlenecks.
removed.name: ShenandoahAllocationTrace

removed.description:
Allow mixing mutator and collector allocations in a single 
region
removed.name: ShenandoahAllowMixedAllocs

removed.description: Pre-touch heap memory, overrides global AlwaysPreTouch
removed.name: ShenandoahAlwaysPreTouch

removed.description: Enable commonming for GC state loads in generated code.
removed.name: ShenandoahCommonGCStateLoads

removed.description: Scan code roots concurrently, instead of during a pause
removed.name: ShenandoahConcurrentScanCodeRoots

removed.description:
How many objects to evacuate on LRB assist path. 
Use zero to disable.
removed.name: ShenandoahEvacAssist

removed.description:
Set the percentage of free heap at which a GC cycle is started. 
Does not apply to all heuristics.
removed.name: ShenandoahFreeThreshold

removed.description:
Size of the Shenandoah regions. Set to zero to detect 
automatically.
removed.name: ShenandoahHeapRegionSize

removed.description: Turn on/off keep alive barriers in Shenandoah
removed.name: ShenandoahKeepAliveBarrier

removed.description:
If GC is currently running in merged update-refs mode 
this numbers gives the threshold when to switch to 
separate update-refs mode. Number is percentage relative 
to duration(marking)+duration(update-refs).
removed.name: ShenandoahMergeUpdateRefsMaxGap

removed.description:
If GC is currently running in separate update-refs mode 
this numbers gives the threshold when to switch to 
merged update-refs mode. Number is percentage relative to
duration(marking)+duration(update-refs).
removed.name: ShenandoahMergeUpdateRefsMinGap

removed.description:
Optimize barriers on final instance fields.
Turn it off for maximum compatibility with reflection or JNI 
code that manipulates final fields.
removed.name: ShenandoahOptimizeInstanceFinals

removed.description:
Optimize barriers on stable fields.
Turn it off for maximum compatibility with reflection or JNI 
code that manipulates final fields.
removed.name: ShenandoahOptimizeStableFinals

removed.description: Number of parallel threads used for safepoint prolog/epilog
removed.name: ShenandoahParallelSafepointThreads

removed.description:
Emit additional code that checks objects are written to only
 in to-space
removed.name: ShenandoahStoreCheck

removed.description: Tracing task termination timings
removed.name: ShenandoahTerminationTrace

removed.description:
Run a separate concurrent reference updating phase after
concurrent evacuation. Possible values: 'on', 'off', 'adaptive'
removed.name: ShenandoahUpdateRefsEarly

removed.description: Verify that == and != are not used on oops. Only in fastdebug
removed.name: ShenandoahVerifyObjectEquals

removed.description:
Enable strict checks that safepoints cannot happen for threads 
that use NoSafepointVerifier
removed.name: StrictSafepointChecks

removed.description: Trace actions of the GC task manager
removed.name: TraceGCTaskManager

removed.description: Trace actions of the GC task queues
removed.name: TraceGCTaskQueue

removed.description: Trace nmethod installation
removed.name: TraceNMethodInstalls

removed.description: Use CMS best fit allocation strategy
removed.name: UseCMSBestFit

removed.description: Only use occupancy as a criterion for starting a CMS collection
removed.name: UseCMSInitiatingOccupancyOnly

removed.description: Use Concurrent Mark-Sweep GC in the old generation
removed.name: UseConcMarkSweepGC

removed.description: ConcurrentMarkSweep thread runs at critical scheduling priority
removed.name: UseCriticalCMSThreadPriority

removed.description: Use worker affinity when asking for GCTasks
removed.name: UseGCTaskAffinity

removed.description: Use the original JNI name escaping scheme
removed.name: UseLegacyJNINameEscaping

removed.description: Do (expensive) block offset array verification
removed.name: VerifyBlockOffsetArray

removed.description: Apply more time consuming verification during compilation
removed.name: VerifyOpto

removed.description: Force tracing of ZStats
removed.name: ZStatisticsForceTrace

removed.description: Verify that reference loads are followed by barriers
removed.name: ZVerifyLoadBarriers
